FuncDef:
The share-shaping random-discard command configures the random discard value for share-shaped queues.
The undo share-shaping random-discard command cancels the configuration.
By default, no random discard value is configured for share-shaped queues.
CLIs: share-shaping { be | af1 | af2 | af3 | af4 | ef | cs6 | cs7 } * random-discard <random-discard-value>
undo share-shaping { be | af1 | af2 | af3 | af4 | ef | cs6 | cs7 } * random-discard <random-discard-value>

ParaDef.Info:
Set the service type to BE.
-

Set the service type to AF1.
-

Set the service type to AF2.
-

Set the service type to AF3.
-

Set the service type to AF4.
-

Set the service type to EF.
-

Set the service type to CS6.
-

Set the service type to CS7.
-

Specifies the percentage based on which traffic is randomly discarded.
The value ranges from 0.1 to 5, in percentage.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure the random discard value for share-shaped queues, run the share-shaping random-discard command.
